title: Ghidra + CAPA: Malware Analysis Engine for DarkAPI & BetterPhish
description: Implement Ghidra reverse engineering with CAPA behavioral detection for automated malware analysis. Docker-based analysis workers, IOC extraction (C2 domains, IPs, crypto wallets, Telegram bots), MITRE ATT&CK mapping. Integrates with BetterPhish for phishing kit analysis and DarkAPI for malware API endpoints. Feeds IOCs to DNSScience RPZ.
